trait.name: Variable Speed and Damage
entries: If the object lacks legs or other appendages it can use for locomotion, it instead has a flying speed of 30 feet and can hover. If the object is securely attached to a surface or larger object, such as a chain bolted to a wall, its speed is 0.
The DM might rule that a specific objects slam attack inflicts slashing or piercing damage based on its form.

action.name: Slam
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4+4) bludgeoning damage.
